message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob!

I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you a little, but I'm not giving up yet either!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up!
I'll take a small piece of the pie, but I'm not giving up yet!

I'll take almost all, you're getting desperate
